biolockj.module.classifier

Interface ClassifierModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BioModule, ScriptModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassifierModuleImpl, Kraken2Classifier, KrakenClassifier, MetaphlanClassifier, QiimeClassifier, QiimeClosedRefClassifier, QiimeDeNovoClassifier, QiimeOpenRefClassifier, RdpClassifier, SlimmClassifier

    public interface ClassifierModule
extends ScriptModule
    Classifier BioModules build one or more bash scripts to call the application on sequence files. Contains methods to build bash scripts for taxonomic assignment of paired and unpaired reads. Contains methods to get classifier command (loaded module, executable file path, or in the $USER $PATH) and optional command line parameters, read from Config."exe.classifierParams"

    • Method Detail

      • getClassifierExe

        String getClassifierExe()
                 throws Exception
        Get the executable from Config "exe.classifier" required to classify the samples.
        Returns:
        Command to execute classifier program
        Throws:
        Exception - if the classifier program undefined or invalid

      • getClassifierParams

        String getClassifierParams()
                    throws Exception
        Get optional list of parameters from Config "exe.classifierParams" to append whenever the classifier executable is called.
        Returns:
        Program switches formatted with "-" or "--" as required by executable
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if parameters defined are invalid
